content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT  *
                FROM    sys.schemas
                WHERE   name = 'mipins' )
    EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [mipins]');
GO

--CREATE VIEW FOR SICKNESS FACT--

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW mipins.vw_mipins_hr_fact_sickness
AS

SELECT DISTINCT

abs.EmployeeID AS StaffNumber,
date.FinancialYear AS MeasureYear,
COUNT(*) as SicknessCount

FROM [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[hr_absence_dim] abs
FULL JOIN [default].[dbo].[calendar_dim_plus] date on date.CalendarDate = abs.AbsenceEndDate
-- WHERE FinancialYear in ('CalendarYear')
GROUP BY EmployeeID
      ,FinancialYear


UNION

SELECT DISTINCT

abs.EmployeeID,
date.CalendarYear,
COUNT(*) as SicknessCount


FROM [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[hr_absence_dim] abs
FULL JOIN [default].[dbo].[calendar_dim_plus] date on date.CalendarDate = abs.AbsenceEndDate
-- WHERE FinancialYear in ('CalendarYear','CalendarYear')
GROUP BY EmployeeID
      ,CalendarYear

GO
